com.jonathan.survivor.screens

Class GameScreen.UiListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jonathan.survivor.screens.GameScreen.UiListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HudListener
    Enclosing class:
    GameScreen

    public class GameScreen.UiListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements HudListener
    Listens to any event that occurs in the HUD of the game. Allows the GameScreen to have knowledge about HUD button presses.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameScreen.UiListener()

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activateTeleporter()
      Delegated when the player wins the game.
      void gameOverHudFinished()
      Called by the GameOverHud when it is done being displayed.
      void onBack()
      Called when the back button is pressed on any Hud instance.
      void onBackpackButton()
      Called when the Backpack button is pressed on the exploration HUD.
      void onPauseButton()
      Delegated when the pause button is pressed whilst in-game.
      void switchToCraftingMenu()
      Called when the crafting button is pressed in the backpack.
      void switchToMainMenu()
      Called when the main menu button was pressed in the pause menu.
      void switchToSurvivalGuide()
      Switches to the survival guide HUD when the survival guide button is pressed in the backpack.
      void toggleInput(boolean on)
      Called when the user presses/releases a button on a HUD.

        Called by the GameOverHud when it is done being displayed. Informs the GameScreen that the player is dead.
